scripts.postbuild: cp -R src/views dist/ && cp package*json dist/
scripts.sam:deploy:production: cross-var sam deploy --stack-name $npm_package_config_cloudFormationStackNameProduction --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-bucket $npm_package_config_s3BucketNameProduction --s3-prefix $npm_package_name --parameter-overrides DomainName=$npm_package_config_domainProduction Certificate=$npm_package_config_certificate BucketNameImages=$npm_package_config_bucketNameImages Stage=$npm_package_config_stageProduction MongoDatabase=$MONGO_DATABASE --region $npm_package_config_region --no-fail-on-empty-changeset
scripts.package-deploy-stage: npm run sam:build && npm run sam:deploy:stage
scripts.package-deploy-production: npm run sam:build && npm run sam:deploy:production
scripts.setup-stage: yarn install && (cross-var aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket $npm_package_config_s3BucketNameStage --region $npm_package_config_region || npm run create-bucket-stage) && npm run package-deploy-stage
scripts.setup-production: yarn install && (cross-var aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket $npm_package_config_s3BucketNameProduction --region $npm_package_config_region || npm run create-bucket-production) && npm run package-deploy-production
scripts.deploy-stage: npm run environment && npm run build && npm run package-deploy-stage
scripts.deploy-production: npm run environment && npm run build && npm run package-deploy-production
scripts.environment: cross-env MONGO_DATABASE=$MONGO_DATABASE NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV HOST=$HOST USERNAME=$USERNAME PASSWORD=$PASSWORD DATABASE=$DATABASE TOKEN_SECRET=$TOKEN_SECRET DISTRIBUTION_ID=$DISTRIBUTION_ID
